Articles.Content:
has anyone had any issues with this one?   I just noticed it didnt pop, while i even got the gilly fly by trophy.

 

Now i have to double back and hope it pops on another encounter
well i got it after going back around and getting another encounter.  very weird i didnt get it the first time
Ive noticed a few people having issues with acheivements on my facebook group.
It seems very buggy, I got the Mun fly by archievment just because my maneuver node had an encounter.

I had the same issue with both Eve and Dres, didn't unlock the flyby but it unlocked the return to kerbin achievement.

One of the of the moons of Jool popped both after flying by (Tylo I think). That's actually consistent with the achievement descriptions, but I had assumed the description was in error.

I just went into a low (120km or so) orbit around Eve, and the trophy never popped for me, either.  Since I got my Kerbals stranded in orbit without enough delta-V to get home, I'll have to rescue them with another mission. Hopefully, I get it then.  I got Ike and Duna a few hours later with no problem. 

 

 

Edited March 29, 2020 by Glorp
fixed mistakes.
